name: Ricetta: stufato di maiale affumicato
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Cured Pork Dry Hotpot.

value.name: Prosciutto
value.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

value.name: Matsutake
value.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

value.name: Bocca di leone
value.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

value.name: Pepe
value.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

value.name: Stufato di maiale affumicato
value.desc: A dish fried over a great flame. Matsutake and Ham have been sliced up, stir-fried, and garnished with some spicy condiments. The flavor of the Ham is a match for the Matsutake's crispness, and the combination grows ever lovelier and more addictive as you chew. The heat-conducting wok also serves to keep it piping hot for long periods.
